Respect: ^As-salamu alaykum Auntie. I am Nolwazi. I am on a quest and I believe you might have something that will help me
^Edrice sent me and told me of a necklace in your possession.
^Is this another one of Edrice’s tricks to get my necklace? I've had that necklace for years and I plan on selling it young lady.
^I will not be giving it away for free. What do you have in return?
Next: ^I’m willing to bargain with you, anything you want, just say the word.
^Why is this necklace so important to you anyway? It’s a battered old thing of little value.
^That can’t be true. Anyway, It is a clue to solving a puzzle left by my grandmother, her name was Nandi you might have known her.
^Yes I knew her, she was always kind to me.Mmmmh…
^Okay girlie, If what you say is true and you really want the necklace, I’ll make you a deal.
^Go to the local market and trade in your gold bracelet  for 150 gold coins.
^Then go to Kareem and say aunty Femi sent you and get bay leaves, Saffron, Anise, Sumac and Incense.
^He should give you 27 gold coins back.
Accept: ^Once I have all those things, only then will I give you the necklace back.
Reject: ^That is too much to ask for a necklace.
^If you do not like it, then you can leave!
Reconsider: ^Good, once you have all those things, then I will give you the necklace.
General: ^I have no interest in whateveryou have to say. Goodbye!.
respect: ^Oh you have learnt some respect now.
^Is this another one of Edrice’s tricks to get my necklace? I've had that necklace for years and I plan on selling it young lady.
^I will not be giving it away for free. What do you have in return?.
next: ^Here are all the things you asked for.
^(reluctantly) Here, take the darn thing. It's caused enough trouble..
^Edrice told me the story of this necklace. I know Ahmed broke your heart.
^Do not talk about things you do not understand, girl. You have your necklace, now go!.
^Actually I do understand. I understand what it feels like to live with regrets.
^And I can tell you now that you are missing out on a valuable friendship,the anger you are holding onto is not worth it Femi, you are only hurting yourself.
^No. I will not leave until you agree to come with me. Edrice needs her friend and so do you.
